import React from'react';import Chart from'react-apexcharts';import{Card,CardBody}from'reactstrap';// simple bar chart
var BarChart=function BarChart(){var apexBarChartOpts={chart:{height:380,type:'bar',toolbar:{show:false}},plotOptions:{bar:{horizontal:false,dataLabels:{position:'top'}}},tooltip:{theme:'dark',x:{show:false}},dataLabels:{enabled:true,offsetX:-6,style:{fontSize:'12px',colors:['#fff']}},colors:["#5369f8","#43d39e","#f77e53","#ffbe0b"],stroke:{show:true,width:1,colors:['#fff']},xaxis:{categories:[2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007],axisBorder:{color:'#d6ddea'},axisTicks:{color:'#d6ddea'}},yaxis:{labels:{offsetX:-10}},legend:{offsetY:-10},states:{hover:{filter:'none'}},grid:{borderColor:'#f1f3fa'}};var apexBarChartData=[{name:'Series 1',data:[44,55,41,64,22,43,21]},{name:'Series 2',data:[53,32,33,52,13,44,32]}];return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CardBody,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"header-title mt-0 mb-3"},"Bar Chart"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Chart,{options:apexBarChartOpts,series:apexBarChartData,type:"bar",className:"apex-charts"})));};export default BarChart;
